TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Idriss_Déby, title = Idriss_Déby, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Idriss_Déby} }

S.FORM: Idriss Déby ryax sa tay 18 nqu tay 6, Idriss Déby, squliq na sezi'. (minhtuw sa kawas tay 1952) mrhuw Chad ta' misuw hya' ga Idriss Déby, aring ryax tay 2 squ byacing tay 12 sa kawas 1990 lga, musa' spazyang balay ms'rux kya la.
